programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Police must wait 30 years for advances in DNA technology to help solve a case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: A Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the police coerced the boy's confession and that the real killer is still on the loose.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: In 1970, Heidi's mom is murdered. 40 years later, she vows to solve the cold case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: The Hitmakers / Favor for a Friend (#73)
programme.desc: A scheme to bribe a country music magazine to manipulate the charts leads to murder in Nashville and a 13-year hunt for the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Death of a Deacon / A Wife's Mission (#105)
programme.desc: When an adulterous church deacon is found shot to death in the back seat of his car, it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot.

programme.desc: Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise.

programme.desc: DNA from a knife is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.desc: A fire in January 2007 claims the life of WWII vet Bennie Angelo.
